name: HippoBuild
headline: The Operating System of the construction industry
description:
Hippo Build is building the Operating System for the Construction industry.   
We automate and optimize back office functions and the supply chain of Small and Medium Construction Companies. We save our customers hours everyday, and 1000’s of dollars every month on better sourced materials. And it takes only minutes for them to onboard

We charge a small SaaS fee, + 1% transaction fee for the materials sourced. We are integrated with multiple marketplaces and providers, letting us automatically source better priced materials. This allows us to stay affordable for the SMB, whilst earning $20-100K per company.

founders.name: Mads Schmidt Petersen, Founder
founders.description:
Crazy danish serials entrepreneur. 
Started my first company in high school, failed, moved on, and havent stopped failing since then. 
I have worked for 8 years mainly in Product Development, across companies and industries, building products in Construction Tech, Fintech, and Machine Learning Services.

HippoBuild is carving out its niche as "the Operating System of the construction industry." Founded in 2021 and part of Y Combinator's Batch W22, this Bogotá-based startup is on a mission to automate and optimize the back-office functions and supply chains of small and medium-sized construction companies. By streamlining these processes, HippoBuild saves its clients both time and money—freeing up hours of labor each day and cutting costs significantly through better-sourced materials.

Their revenue model is straightforward and small-business-friendly: they charge a nominal SaaS fee plus a 1% transaction fee on sourced materials. This setup allows HippoBuild to keep its services accessible while generating considerable income, averaging between $20,000 and $100,000 per client.

Employing a lean team of just five people, HippoBuild leverages predictive data models to offer competitive pricing for construction materials, ensuring that their customers never overpay. The onboarding process is swift—taking only minutes—allowing new users to dive right into the efficiency boost that HippoBuild promises.

Their platform integrates with various marketplaces, enabling automated sourcing that significantly enhances procurement processes for construction firms. It also emphasizes user-friendly features like real-time data analysis, predictive purchasing insights, and group demand modeling to secure the best prices on materials.

Catch them online at [hippo.build](https://hippo.build) for more on how they're simplifying construction supply chains throughout Latin America. As HippoBuild continues to grow, they're emblematic of how technology can modernize and elevate traditional industries.
